brainly_data.question:
Computers, social media, and the Internet have had the effect of a.Reducing poverty and malnutrition.
b.Reducing trade barriers between nations.
c.Improving medical technology in developing countries.
d.Making the world a "smaller" place by increasing communication speeds.
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

all_answers.question:
Computers, social media, and the Internet have had the effect of a.Reducing poverty and malnutrition.
b.Reducing trade barriers between nations.
c.Improving medical technology in developing countries.
d.Making the world a "smaller" place by increasing communication speeds.
all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text: The answer is D. Making the world a "smaller" place by increasing communication speeds.!
